Package clientGUIControllers

Class ShipmentsConfirmationController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.ShipmentsConfirmationController
public class ShipmentsConfirmationController extends Object
Shipments confirmation controller for area deliveries employee to confirm all of the shipment in his area that in status "Waiting for confirmation" to start their shipment process.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShipmentsConfirmationController

      public ShipmentsConfirmationController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method is used to set visibility of the buttons ,text fields, combo box, images and labels. In addition, this method gets all of the shipments that in status "Waiting for confirmation" and from the same area of the area deliveries operator area. and displays a small window showing how many shipments it has to approve.

    • selectOrder

      void selectOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - An order is selected from the orders combo box. According to the selected order, the method will show the deliveries operator employee all the details about it and the content of the order, and show to the worker a combo box for confirm the order.

    • selectStatus

      void selectStatus(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - An status is selected from the status combo box. This method will cause the confirm button to disable according to the selected status just when the worker will choose "In Proccess" status he can click on confirm.

    • confirmPressed

      void confirmPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Confirm button pressed, When the worker clicks on the confirm button, the method will update the status of the order and the calculate the estimate delivery date of the order, In addition, a small screen will pop up that informs that the delivery process has been started successfully and sent e-mail and SMS to the customer.

    • helpPressed

      void helpPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Help button pressed the method will show the help label and set the help button to disable.

    • backPressed

      void backPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - Back button pressed, and the method will take us back to the area deliveries operator home page.

    • logOutPressed

      void logOutPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - log Out Button Pressed log out the user.

    • xPressed

      void xPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - X button pressed. close the program and log out the user.

    • findOrder

      private Order findOrder(Integer orderNum)
      Finds an Order object based on the order number.
      Parameters:
      orderNum - The order number to search for.
      Returns:
      An Order object that matches the given order number, or null if no match is found.

    • setLabels

      private void setLabels()
      This method set labels for the initialize screen.

    • initTableView

      private void initTableView()
      method to set the wanted order's details into the table.

    • calculateDeliveryTime

      private void calculateDeliveryTime(Shipment s)
      Parameters:
      s - - Shipment that confirmed This method will calculate the estimate delivery date of the shipment considering the country to which the shipment is made.

    • updateEstimateDate

      private void updateEstimateDate(Date estimateDeliveryDate)
      Parameters:
      estimateDeliveryDate - from type Date and go to the DB to update the delivery date.

    • localDateToDate

      private Date localDateToDate(LocalDateTime date)
      Converts a LocalDateTime object to a Date object.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDateTime object to convert.
      Returns:
      A Date object that represents the same date and time as the input LocalDateTime object.

    • getCustomerArea

      public static String getCustomerArea()
      Get method for get the customer area for calculating the delivery date to him.
      Returns:
      String object of the customer area for calculating the delivery date to him.

    • setCustomerArea

      public static void setCustomerArea(String customerArea)
      Set method for set customer area when we got this information from DB.

    • getUserForSMSAndEmail

      public static User getUserForSMSAndEmail()
      Get method for get the customer that we want to send him SMS and E-mail.
      Returns:
      User object of the user that we want to send him SMS and E-mail.

    • setUserForSMSAndEmail

      public static void setUserForSMSAndEmail(User userForSMSAndEmail)
      Set method to set the customer when we go him from DB.
